attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please keep byways open to vehicles as alot of them have alot of historic rights of way.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "keep byways open to vehicles."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13602.asp

Prime Minister's Office
